thread.title: Wonderful Stay, Loved the hospitality
thread.title_full: Wonderful Stay, Loved the hospitality - Review of The Manhattan at Times Square Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Rahul M
title: Wonderful Stay, Loved the hospitality
text:
It was our first trip to NewYork, United states and we were booked at The Manhattan @ times square , we were very pleased by the hospitality provided to us from Mr. Mohammed at reception and through out our stay.
We were guided for our travel and the hotel is located at much convenient location.
